skills.name: ACCURSED CAROL
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Cleanse and Increase ATK of all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: WICKED WREATH
desc: • Heal all allies based on their ATK.
• Grants Invincibility for 1 turn and Power Generation for 2 turns if Attack Up is present.

skills.name: SNOW SHIELD
desc: Gains a Snow Shield at the start of battle. Snow Shield absorbs damage and returns it as true damage after 1 turn with a 35% chance to Taunt or Freeze all enemies.
